title: Service Management 26.1.1 patch release notes
content:
Software release date: February 2026

See the SMA-SM patch release notes if you have enabled the SMA-SM Service Portal.

This patch release includes updates to version 26.1 of Service Management, including Audit and Aviator, OO, and UCMDB. It also contains improvements and fixes related to security, and is recommended to minimize any potential security risks.

What's new

Fixed issues

This patch release includes the following fixes.

Service Management Version 26.1.1

Category

Issue ID

Description
Service Management OCTCR19XW2722110 ESM API get offering returning wrong datatype
Service Management OCTCR19XW2745149 PS - excessive warnings on package simulation
Service Management OCTCR19XW2722410 Live Support - Comment can be lost if dialog opened too early
Service Management OCTCR19XW2732603 Rule search in Studio does not work correctly for Japanese and English strings in combination with special characters
Service Management OCTCR19XW2732797 During Dynamic field validation cursor hangs with spinning icon
Service Management OCTCR19XW2733758 Annoying blue message popping up in portal after upgrade to 25.3
Service Management OCTCR19XW2733800 Viewing an Offering in Service with many User Options is sluggish
Service Management OCTCR19XW2736346 Mismatch Between Search Phrase and Displayed Result in 'Processes and Rules' search of Studio when searching for special characters
Service Management OCTCR19XW2740667 Export survey data is disorganized and the answers do not match the question
Service Management OCTCR19XW2740798 Post US24 upgrade to 25.4, active subscription emails do not populate values from aggregated offering fields
Service Management OCTCR19XW2728393
SMAX 24.1~Linux - Reports not getting generate with the filters
Service Management OCTCR19XW2728876
Cache Invalidation Problem List Order Volatile Lists
Service Management OCTCR19XW2526836 SMAX Live Support - Entitled offerings filter returns server error

Containerized UD/UCMDB Version 26.1.1

Category

Issue ID

Description
Global search OCTCR19XW2748236
Global search and filtering are producing inaccurate results
Topology OCTCR19XW2732443
When accessing the Topology the following warning appears: “No templates available"
Topology OCTCR19XW2734072
(SMAX only) The Show Impact button is not available for non-admin users in the CI Topology

Apply the patch

You can optionally download the ot-package-sign.pub key from knowledge article KM000003948 to verify your downloaded packages. This knowledge article provides detailed instructions. 

Apply OMT 26.1.1 patch

Download 26.1.1 patch packages:

  • OMT2611-xxx-15001-Embedded-K8s.zip (from here)
  • OMT2611-xxx-15001-External-K8s.zip (from here)

To apply the patch, follow the OMT 26.1 upgrade guide procedures: Upgrade OMT (embedded Kubernetes) or Upgrade OMT (managed Kubernetes).

Apply Service Management 26.1.1 patch

Download the Service Management patch package from here. This package includes the following files required for Service Management deployment. 

  • ESM_Helm_Chart-26.1.1.zip: This package includes the Service Management Helm and Audit Collector Helm chart. 
  • Audit_Helm_Chart-26.1.1.zip

You can apply the Service Management patch on top of version 26.1. For instructions to apply the patch, see Apply Service Management patch.

Apply Audit 26.1.1 patch

Refer to the following instructions, suitable for your environment, to apply the Audit service patch and the Audit collector patch:

  • If Audit is deployed on an embedded Kubernetes environment, see Apply Audit patch (embedded Kubernetes).
  • If Audit is deployed on a managed Kubernetes environment such as AWS (EKS) or OpenShift, see Apply Audit patch (managed Kubernetes).

Apply Containerized UCMDB 26.1.1 patch

The containerized UCMDB patch is available to download from here. Refer to the following instructions, suitable for your environment, to apply the patch:

  • If Containerized UCMDB is deployed in an embedded Kubernetes environment, see Apply UCMDB patch (embedded Kubernetes).
  • If Containerized UCMDB is deployed on a managed Kubernetes environment such as Azure (AKS), AWS (EKS), or OpenShift, see Apply UCMDB patch (managed Kubernetes).

Apply OO Containerized 26.1.1 patch

The OO Containerized patch can be downloaded from here. For detailed installation steps, see Apply OO Containerized patch.
